metadata.title: CVE-2019-16685 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Dolibarr 9.0.5 has stored XSS vulnerability via a User Group Descriptionsection to card.php. A user with the "Create/modify other users, groups andpermissions" privilege can inject script and can also achieve privilegeescalation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
